Would prefer a new name that indicates what it actually is for
Yeah I agree that it’s not a good name. I think it’s better to just call it boolean_value or i. Do you have any better idea @luke-jr?
I suggest `active_internal`, and while you're at it, make the inner loop `active_type`

Not sure what you're asking. I was just suggesting renaming the `t` variable to `active_type`

events.body: Ok, I renamed it as you suggested. It would be cool if you can review the code once again. thnx
Needs commits squashed, proper commit message, PR title updated etc.

@n0feer thanks for the contribution here, but I'm going to close this PR in favour of #19651, as that is pretty much mergable.
